trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The Eulmoran soldier requires some assistance in his endeavor to raise the spirits of his city's people.
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_TODO_00<tab>Take notes on Eulmorans' food preferences.
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_TODO_01<tab>Report to the Eulmoran soldier at the Eulmoran Army Headquarters.
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SOLDIER03520_000_000<tab>Haven't we met somewh─ Oh, it's you! I saw you fight! You were so strong, so confident, but so careful not to injure any of the civilians...

TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SOLDIER03520_000_002<tab>Maybe you'd be interested in helping out with what I'm planning. I'm a fairly decent cook, actually─I sometimes feel as if that's the <var 1A 02 /var>only<var 1A 01 /var> thing I'm good at─and I thought it might bring people comfort to know that they could come here and get a decent meal.

TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SOLDIER03520_000_003<tab>The trouble is, there are too many options as to what I could prepare, and I'm not much for making decisions. I would simply ask around, but civilians tend to get a bit nervous when a member of the army starts asking questions, and I don't want to cause anyone <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> distress.
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SOLDIER03520_000_004<tab>That being the case─would you mind asking a few people what sort of dishes might lift their spirits? I don't need the recipes, just ideas.
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_ROITATCHA_000_010<tab>Food that would lift my spirits? Hmm... Voeburt muffins, maybe? My mother often used to make them.

TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_CHADDRIC_000_011<tab>Free meals? Yes, that would certainly improve the mood around here. As for what people would enjoy─perhaps a dish that they've never had before? Though I'm not terribly familiar with anything other than Voeburtite cuisine, myself.

TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_LEAMOSHEI_000_012<tab>How about Kholusian stew? It was a popular dish before the Flood, apparently. All I really know is that it's meant to incorporate a variety of seafood, but I've always wanted to try it─seems a shame that I've never had the traditional food of my homeland.
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_ROITATCHA_000_013<tab>The smell of baking muffins is absolutely divine, I assure you!
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_CHADDRIC_000_014<tab>Perhaps someone who wasn't born locally might have more ideas...

TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_LEAMOSHEI_000_015<tab>I don't know about you, but reviving the popularity of Kholusian stew and reclaiming our heritage would certainly raise <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> spirits!
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SOLDIER03520_000_016<tab>Welcome back! Were people able to suggest anything for me to cook?
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SOLDIER03520_000_020<tab>Oh, you wrote them down! Thank you! Let me see...
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SOLDIER03520_000_021<tab>Ah, Voeburt muffins and Kholusian stew! I've made those for my patrons before. I'll need fresh seafood from Stilltide, but that shouldn't be an issue.

TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SOLDIER03520_000_022<tab>As for a dish that people in Eulmore haven't had before─what do you think? Have you come upon anything in your travels outside the city that people might enjoy?
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_A1_000_001<tab>Nothing is so comforting as one of the Mol's buuz on a chill evening.
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_A2_000_002<tab>Perhaps a relaxing cup of herbal tea to pair with the meal?
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_A2_000_003<tab>Basilisk stew has been known to increase morale.

TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SOLDIER03520_000_023<tab>Dough with seafood <var 1A 02 /var>inside<var 1A 01 /var> of it? That does sound intriguing. Salty shellfish and tender stewed catfish, together in a hearty bun... Yes, I can picture it.

TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SOLDIER03520_000_024<tab>Yes, that does sound pleasant. We can't focus solely on the food, after all. I haven't the slightest idea what an “Ishgard” is, but I'd certainly be willing to try brewing tea with lily bulbs.
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SOLDIER03520_000_025<tab>A sergeant who offered homemade stew to his troops, warming their hearts and lifting their spirits? Oh, I love a dish with a story to tell!
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SOLDIER03520_000_026<tab>I'll prepare each of these with the care they deserve, and hopefully my fellow Eulmorans will find some solace in sharing a warm meal.
TEXT_LUCKZH010_03520_SOLDIER03520_000_027<tab>I'm off to fetch ingredients, but before I go─here's a little something that I prepared for you, as thanks. I hope it suits your tastes!
